sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>This fix script is used to insert the customer defined URL redirect properties into new table sys_cs_portal_url_mapping</description> <name>Insert Customer URL Redirect Properties</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var excludePropertyList = ['04f11456530120103296ddeeff7b1203', '3e454452530120103296ddeeff7b12cd', '8ba9649a534120103296ddeeff7b1294', '8df694f73b2123009cbbcea234efc41e', '29c1fc26532020103296ddeeff7b1216', '581844373b2123009cbbcea234efc444', '5b09a09a534120103296ddeeff7b1274', '796888373b2123009cbbcea234efc49b', 'fe880c373b2123009cbbcea234efc4e4', '13cf507b3b2123009cbbcea234efc4b7', '6f4788f33b2123009cbbcea234efc477', '32d5d8b73b2123009cbbcea234efc4e8', '3ce604f33b2123009cbbcea234efc47a', '97c700373b2123009cbbcea234efc49c', 'c437c4f33b2123009cbbcea234efc4e5', '7d56dcb73b2123009cbbcea234efc4d3', '9b774cf33b2123009cbbcea234efc441', 'b730647b3b2123009cbbcea234efc479', 'ddf780373b2123009cbbcea234efc4f9', '1dfee53773e0330018dd3ae234f6a77d', '53ef2b0353e700101db6ddeeff7b12c5', 'd31786d1536020101865ddeeff7b1276']; new CSUrlRedirectUtils().insertCustomerPortalProperties(excludePropertyList);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-03-05 05:23:09</sys_created_on> <sys_id>3fecbd4453f620102b57ddeeff7b12df</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Insert Customer URL Redirect Properties</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Glide Conversation Server" source="com.glide.cs">f9f62e472f000110d8a4d5f62799b60c</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_3fecbd4453f620102b57ddeeff7b12df</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-03-08 13:09:11</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
